altTitles.ja: キャンディー・ガール

description.en:
1. Candy Girls (Kyandii Gaaruzu)
Hiro walks into his little sister's, Hina's, room, delivering juice, only to find her and her two friends playing the feet-licking game. He would rather have nothing to do with that, but then Goma, the girl currently licking Hina's feet, decides that it's his and Sattsun's turn to have a match.

2. Panchira Ero Tenshi (Naughty Upskirt Angels)
A guy, tired from a long day at school's club, is on his way home by a train. He tries to peek at a girl's panties, but is caught and the girl and her friend start laughing. Humiliated, he is about to start pretending he doesn't exist, but he quickly notices that both girls begin acting carelessly. As he is able to see more and more, he can't tear his eyes away.

3. Imouto no tomodachi (My Little Sister's Friend)
Having his room hijacked by his little sister, Mio, and her friend, Shiori, and being made to help them study, the older brother is not eager yet does his best to help them. However, Mio soon leaves, giving Shiori the chance to get closer to the brother. She tries to follow Mio's advice but only makes the atmosphere awkward. Thankfully, a bit of clumsiness and a bit of boldness is all it takes.

4. Chinatsu no Umi (Chinatsu's Sea)
About two cousins, a brief love shared, and the passage of time.

5. Tonari no Wakui-san (My Neighbor Wakui-san / The Wakui-san Next to Me)
Wakui is a shy, reserved girl who just can't say no to anyone. Her classmate, Yokouchi, notices that she is constantly being taken advantage of by the other students because of this. One day, when Wakui is asked to take another student's place for cleaning duty, Yokouchi decides to stay and help...

6. Masegaki Temptation
Tooru just wants to play games, but his niece Saori has other plans for him. As usual, she is prancing around his place in only sexy lingerie, happy to be able to be herself, away from her mother. However, she also really wants to have sex, and she is not at all shy to use the tricks she has learned from Tooru to get her way.

7. Masegaki Satisfaction
After Tooru fulfilled his promise to buy Saori clothes, he is beat. Saori is lively as always, but he just wants have a bath. (Un)fortunately, his not about to be left alone.

8. Masegaki Education
Saori shows up at Tooru's doorstep late at night, having run away after a fight with her mom. When Tooru calls his sister to let her know about Saori, he stands up for Saori, which makes her happy.

9. Garudere
Garu is dating her fellow wrestling fan Nobu. However, he is also a moe otaku, so for her birthday he not only gives her the wrestling ticket she wanted but also a maid costume. She is not very pleased about the latter, but after she accidentally breaks Nobu's figurine while throwing a tantrum about it, she can't avoid wearing it.

10. Mama Kon
A boy and a girl go to her house to work on homework together, and her mother looks after him when the girl falls asleep (with the help of some spiked tea).

**TAGS**
**MALE** business suit, foot licking, glasses, schoolboy uniform, shotacon
**FEMALE** anal, anal intercourse, bike shorts, bikini, cousin, defloration, exhibitionism, femdom, foot licking, glasses, lolicon, maid, milf, nakadashi, niece, schoolgirl uniform, sex toys, sister, small breasts, stockings, swimsuit, tanlines, tomboy
**MIXED** ffm threesome, group, incest
**OTHER** tankoubon, uncensored (partially)
